p: Thermogravimetry analysis (TGA) and derivative thermogravimetry (DTG) of the polymer electrolyte membranes were performed using a TGA1 STARe system apparatus (TG7, METTLER TOLEDO, Zurich, Switzerland). Samples of about 10 mg were loaded into an aluminum pan and then heated from 50 to 700 °C at a rate of 10 °C min −1 under a nitrogen atmosphere.
